That's right.  Propose Your Own Deal.

Two cards remain.  

Card #2 - Lou Ritter PSA 4.5 

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/58114/ritter[/IMG]

Card #3 - Johnny Evers (Portrait) SGC A.  The reverse features an unusual "3".  Is it a 3 over a "missing" 3 or a 3 over a "missing" 1 or is it simply a "50 Subjects" card?  What a conversation piece to add to your collection.  If you like "well-loved" cards, this one is for you.

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10041/evers-portrait[/IMG]

All card(s) are shipped free of charge as well.

Finally, if you don’t want the cards, you can BYOB.:D

When we finish the bottle, make an offer.

Even ridiculous offers will be considered.

McAleese has been sold.

Evers price has been brutally slashed.

Both cards are available for a mere combined price of $150.

The cards are now up for grabs.  Make your own deal.  Pay what you want and get it the way you want: Local pick up, carrier pigeon, FedEx, snail mail, your choice.  

Operator(s) are standing by.:D

Pm sent
